brand brand le -> delicate : 1
brand le delicate -> of : 1
le delicate of -> delicate : 1
delicate of delicate -> le : 1
of delicate le -> was : 1
delicate le was -> born : 1
le was born -> in : 1
was born in -> and : 1
born in and -> attended : 1
in and attended -> the : 1
and attended the -> universities : 1
attended the universities -> of : 1
the universities of -> bern : 1
universities of bern -> and : 1
of bern and -> he : 1
bern and he -> taught : 1
and he taught -> at : 1
he taught at -> eton : 1
taught at eton -> and : 1
at eton and -> served : 1
eton and served -> briefly : 1
and served briefly -> in : 1
served briefly in -> british : 1
briefly in british -> intelligence : 1
in british intelligence -> during : 1
british intelligence during -> the : 1
intelligence during the -> cold : 1
during the cold -> for : 1
the cold for -> the : 1
cold for the -> last : 1
for the last -> fifty : 1
for the last -> however : 1
for the last -> three : 1
for the last -> inwardly : 1
for the last -> eight : 1
the last fifty -> years : 1
last fifty years -> he : 1
fifty years he -> has : 1
years he has -> lived : 1
he has lived -> by : 1
has lived by -> his : 1
lived by his -> he : 1
by his he -> divides : 1
